entry.title: Sheaves
entry.summary: In this post, and the ones that are going to follow, we attempt to treat the theory of sheaves, albeit at a basic level, with extensive treatment. ssasa ss 1. The Fundamentals Definition 1.1. Let $X$ be a topological space. (1) A presheaf $\mathscr{F}$ of sets on on $X$ consists of producing a set $\mathscr{F} (U)$ for every open subset $U$ of $X$, and a morphism $_{U, V} \colon \mathscr{F} ...
